entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as fumbling in her robes and trying to retrieve a beaded bag. She is also mentioned as having terror in her face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seizing the sword, touching its tip to a silver flagon, and struggling to think of a way up to the cup. He is also mentioned as looking at Ron and Hermione with terror in their faces.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being the tallest among them and unable to reach the shelf where the cup reposed.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is described as shining and having a rubied hilt. It is also mentioned as being used by Harry to touch its tip to a silver flagon.

entities.name: cup
entities.description: The cup is described as reposing on a shelf that is out of reach for any of them.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is mentioned as roaring on the other side of the vault door.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: A horde of goblins is described as approaching on the other side of the door.

relationships.description: Harry seized the sword by its rubied hilt and touched the tip of the blade to a silver flagon nearby.
Harry struggled to think of a way up to the cup.
Hermione had terror in her face as she saw Harry looking at Ron and Hermione with terror in their faces.
